description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VoidCoders, innovs Void Elementor WHMCS Elements For Elementor Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Void Elementor WHMCS Elements For Elementor Page Builder: from n/a through 2.0.

product.name: Void Elementor WHMCS Elements For Elementor Page Builder
